item.title: Reset the Microsoft Outlook folder language
item.description: During a Microsoft Exchange (Exchange 2007 to Exchange 2007) migration between to organizations, I discovered that some mailboxes had an English folder structure in MS Outlook instead of a Dutch. After the mailbox is exported and imported using the export- and import-mailbox command, the users starts the Microsoft Outlook 2007 (Dutch).
